code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var userSlice=createSlice({name:"user",initialState:{currentUser:null,isFetching:false,erorr:false},reducers:{loginStart:function loginStart(state){state.isFetching=true;},loginSuccess:function loginSuccess(state,action){state.isFetching=false;state.currentUser=action.payload;},loginFailuer:function loginFailuer(state){state.isFetching=false;state.erorr=true;},logout:function logout(state){state.currentUser=null;}}});var _userSlice$actions=userSlice.actions,loginStart=_userSlice$actions.loginStart,loginSuccess=_userSlice$actions.loginSuccess,loginFailuer=_userSlice$actions.loginFailuer,logout=_userSlice$actions.logout;export{loginStart,loginSuccess,loginFailuer,logout};export default userSlice.reducer;export var usersSelector=function usersSelector(state){return state.user;};export var userSelector=function userSelector(state){return state.user.currentUser;};//export const currentSelector =userSelector((state)=> state.user.currentUser);
